trans-unit.source: Contains information on a tracked <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder informasjon om en sporede <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> class using the specified name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet,-IDen, forekomst-ID og type.

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity.
The activity ID.
The instance ID of the activity.
The type name of the activity.
Gets the ID for the activity.
The activity ID.
Gets the run-time ID of the activity instance.
An activity can occur multiple times during processing, such as an activity that is processed within a loop.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet kan oppstå flere ganger under behandling, for eksempel en aktivitet som behandles i en sløyfe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> contains the ID of the activity and does not change while the InstanceId contains the ID of the specific instance of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>inneholder IDen til aktiviteten og endres ikke InstanceId inneholder IDen for den bestemte forekomsten av aktiviteten.</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InstanceId is different for each specific instance.
trans-unit.target: InstanceId er forskjellig for hver spesifikk forekomst.

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that is processed in a loop would have a different InstanceId for each cycle through the loop while the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> would remain the same.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet som behandles i en sløyfe vil for eksempel ha forskjellige InstanceId for hver Bla gjennom sløyfen under den <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>vil fremdeles være den samme.</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
Gets the name associated with the activity
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet som er tilknyttet aktiviteten

trans-unit.source: The activity name.
Gets a string representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: Henter en strengrepresentasjon av den <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"> </xref> objekt

trans-unit.source: The activity name, ID, instance ID and type name.
Gets the type name of the activity.
The type name of the activity.
